case.state: Here's to hoping this'll be a good use of my one day off.
I've only got one day off, so let's not waste time, alright?
Pauling, here. I've arrived at the Inventory.
Pauling, here. God it's nice to be out of New Mexico for once.
With respect to my usual partners, I'm glad to see some new faces. Name's Pauling.
Name's Pauling. Miss Pauling.
Let's... not think about what the Administrator will say when she finds out I came here.
Oh, a personality core. You're from Aperture, right?
Oh Aperture Science? How is Mr. Johnson these days?
A ghost? God, don't tell me Merasmus sent you. It is my one day off.
Is it Halloween already?
Rebecca Lee! You're lucky this is my day off.
Revy, you smug bitch. There's more money on your head than you realize.
Rebecca Lee, you're on my list. Thank your lucky stars I'm not on the job, or you'd be toast.
You're giving me the creeps, kid. Keep your distance.
I know a psycho when I see one, and I see a lot of them. Don't come any closer.
Keep your distance, crazy. I can tell that knife gets a lot of use.
Chun-Li, you're with Interpol, right? Nice to make your acquaintance.
Chun-Li, agent of Interpol. How do you feel about bribes?
Chun-Li. Not a big fan of crime, I take it. That's all good, I'm not a big criminal or anything.
Juri, you sadist bitch. If I were on the job you'd be good as terminated.
Put on some clothes. You don't look sexy, you just look garish.
(Juri-Han, she's on my list... but I don't have to go after her just yet, it's my day off...)
(Shit! Tall pretty lady!)
(Keep your cool, Pauling! The statue lady isn't THAT hot!)
(Gah! Fuck! Lady tall! Lady hot! Concentrate, Pauling, you're a professional!)
(No wonder she's from the Flame Tribe, she's got me smoking! Oh thank God I didn't say that out loud.)

Panty Anarchy! Wanted for 529 cases of public indecency, 18 cases of assault and battery, 3 of inciting a public insurrection, 3 voluntary manslaughter, and one second-degree murder. It's a good thing I'm not a cop.
Jolyne Cujoh. Wanted for one count of hit and run, one of prison break, one of inciting a riot, and on suspicion of first-degree murder. But no worries, I'm not a narc.
Lena Oxton, AKA "Tracer." Overwatch agent and world-famous hero. But frankly, I think she's a bit of a posh bitch, who's so high off her own fumes she can no longer take air into her lungs.
Lena Oxton, Codename: Tracer. God, having one obnoxious, super-speedy kid with an ego complex in my life was already enough.
Cheers, loves, the cavalry's here! I meant me, by the way. I was snubbing Tracer. If that wasn't obvious.
Fuck orgies. I mean, like, orgies are fine, but they're all sweaty and messy and nobody's having as much fun as they wish they were. Strip poker is much more pleasant.
You're already dead? But I just got here!
Smells like there's someone dead in here... But I was sure I cleaned up everything properly...
What, is it Halloween already?
An angel? To be honest, I'm surprised I'm not running into one of the other guys.
An angel? But I just got here...
(Whoah... big lady... pretty...)
(Shit! She's pretty!)
(Holy hell, is she a goddess?) Wait, she's ACTUALLY a goddess!?

That sounds like a fantastic plan! It's getting late, but if we finish in time for another game, I'd be happy to join you for some watersports. Not in the pee way, though. I mean that wouldn't be the worst, but it's also not what I meant.
That sounds like a pretty hostile working environment. Not that I'd know about that sort of thing.
Your viewers can take all the screenshots they like, Streaming-chan, but if they share them I'm gonna have to kill them.~ That was a joke. Just for clarity.
As do you, Mia. I get the impression that we might have more in common than either of us realize.
Eighteen whole hands. Crazy. Impressive, you doing all that without any limbs.
Oh! A butterfly! How pleasant, I'm so... incredibly glad that I have the... unique opportunity to spend my one game of strip poker a year against... a butterfly...
Hey, uh, you in the tights. Not to be awkward or anything, but you know we can see your cameltoe in that outfit, right? It's classy, though!
Let's hope this won't be a waste of my one day off.
Don't fuck me, dealer, or you might see me again after the game. I mean, metaphorically. Euphemistically.
This should be fun! Wow, "fun..." that's a weird word. Don't say it often.
Oh, ~player~! It's so convenient we met here, I have a contract to- oh, wait, nevermind, I'm looking for a different "~player~"
Let's get down to business.
I'll warn you all beforehand, I'm a professional.
I am going to need ~cards~ cards.
Put me down for ~cards~ cards.
I need ~cards~.
Dealer, ~cards~, and make it snappy.
~cards~ cards, dealer. Haven't got all night.
(Why do we always announce how many cards we're changing out, anyway?)
Nothing's perfect on the first try. ~cards~ new cards, dealer.
If this first hand is any indication of my overall luck tonight, you folks are in for a rough game.
Ooh! My first hand and it's already a killer. If I believed in omens, I'd call that a good one.
Now that's a winning tactic!
This'll do the job.
Nice!
I'll trade this hand for a key, because it's too refined. Get it?
Skill always beats luck.
Critical hit! They're fair and balanced.
I love it when a good plan comes together. They so rarely do...
Just what I needed.

Looks like you guys aren't gonna see anything
more just yet.
Statistically speaking, looks like my shirt stays on.
This hand is too refined.
I hope you're having fun staring at my panties, because you aren't getting anything more just yet.
Alright, looks like I'm covered a bit longer.
This will work.
The girls aren't coming out just yet. Unless someone was cheating, of course. I would never.
Phew, good timing. I almost had to STRIP in this game of STRIP POKER. Crazy, right? Glad that didn't happen.
This hand is rock solid. Like a dong. Or a magnum. Or a magnum dong.
Took 'em long enough, but the cards have finally joined the winning team. Go team Pauling!
Aren't you guys glad I decided not to cheat and easily win? This way, you all get this nice view of my body! You're not seeing any more of it just yet, though!~
This is just what I needed
(See, Pauling? A good hand! Stick with the plan and you've got this!)

Don't get too excited, folks. The panties stay
on for now.

If you thought I was out
of the game, you're
sorely mistaken.
The glasses stay on, by the way. So do my panties, but I just wanted you to know.
My luck's looking up! Just like you should be, pervs. My eyes are up here.
Whoops! I guess all of you were probably looking forward to my forfeit, huh? Too bad!
You'll have to wait for the climax a little bit longer...

I like this hand. It's like an engraved steel 50 caliber handgun loaded with armor-piercing DU rounds for maximum penetration through flesh, bone, armor, and obstructions. Well, I guess this hand isn't that good.
Sheesh, I was worried, but it all worked out.
I'm not out of the game just yet! But I bet it's not "winning" and "losing" that most of you reprobates are worried about anyway.
(This is still your game to win, Pauling! If you could beat Spy after he cheated on every hand, you can beat these jokers no problem!)
I'm still in the game! Did you think Miss "Fucking" Pauling was going to lose that easily?
Looks like I'm not gonna get off just yet. Unless one of you losers can make me~
Not a bit of clothing gone and I've got an unbeatable hand. I think I overprepared for this.
I like to be more confident about my hands, but I guess that's not always possible.
I've made do with worse.
Not my best, but not my worst.
Chances are, somebody has something worse.
A royal flush! (Perfect! They'll never suspect that I'm bluffing!)
I guess they can't all be winners.
A decade of experience herding cats, two decades of experience as a professional cleaner and hitwoman, and the best hand I can manage is "decent."

(I hate to imagine what the Administrator would say if she were here... probably something like, "Pauling, execute everyone present, dress yourself, and write next year's day off out of your schedule!" Yeah, let's not think about that...)

Another fine, boring, generic, and otherwise fully uninteresting hand. But I guess when you think about it, almost ALL poker hands are most of those things. It's not like having four big "K"s makes the hand look any cooler.
This hand's pretty mediocre. Truth be told, I'm half-hoping that I lose, I'd kinda rather be in my panties than pantyhose.
Eh, I could do much worse.
Not the worst hand in the world. Might be the worst hand at the table, though. Let's hope not. I guess all of you are hoping it is, though. Jerks.
Y'know, sometimes I wish I could just get purely crap hands instead of generic, mediocre ones. "Oh wow, I got a pair!" Yeah, that's not interesting at all. A 7 high is, like, way more memorable.
With 5 draws and one exchange, a pair is actually the MOST likely hand to get assuming you're going for one. That's right, everyone with just a high card- you're below the bell curve.

Statistically speaking, I probably won't have the best hand this turn, but lucky for me, I don't
need to!
This hand started out poor, but now it's been reclaimed.

I know it's not about winning or losing, but it's still a little sad when all your hands are just
boring, right?
I've made do with much worse. This'll be OK.

Chances are, someone has something worse. If they don't, well... I guess I lose? That part's kinda self-explanatory, but I waited too long to stop talking, now I'm just too invested in the sentence... is anyone even paying attention to me right now?

Could be worse. Should be better. (I'm talking to
you, Dealer.)
(I left my piece with my belt, but maybe I should have counted it as an item. That would've made eight...)
(If I count my glasses as an item, I could get up to eight layers, but I wouldn't enjoy the finale as much without my glasses...)
I could be wearing less, and I could have worse cards. No need to stress about something that could be much worse.
Statistically speaking, this probably isn't a losing hand, but if all of you can beat me, then I'll be out of of my shirt. Good luck!
I've been wearing less clothes and staring down a worse hand than this plenty times. I wasn't playing strip poker at the time, though.
These'll probably do the job. Even if they don't, I'm still in the game.
(No need to be such a stick in the mud, Pauling. Not every hand is a winner.)
This is my hand. There are many hands like it, but this one is mine.

Aren't you guys glad I decided not to cheat and easily win? This way, you all get this nice view
of my body!
This hand looked like it might be garbage, but I reclaimed it.
(See, if I traded out the... well, no use crying over spilled milk.)
Decent hand, I've been in worse scrapes.
Nothing to stress about here. If I lose, that's fate. Well, I don't believe in "fate" specifically, but... well, nevermind.

A royal flush is literally 1 in 1,000,000. A 7-high, the worst possible hand, is one in several thousand. A pair, incidentally, is pretty
much 50/50.
You might think I'm down and out, but I'm not ready to throw in the towel just yet. Or I guess I'm not ready tosit on the towel, in this case.
This hand looks average, but I see great things in its future. (Gosh, I hope none of them can tell I'm bluffing. This hand's future is... cloudy.)
These had better be enough...
I guess this hand is fine. Even in this situation, chances are I'll still hold out.
(I'm not ready to lose yet. If I go out, I want it to be to something spectacularly bad, not spectacularly generic.)
I've got a good feeling about this hand! It might be generic and pretty bad, and I might be buck-ass naked in front of a bunch of total strangers, but this hand is giving me good vibes!
Well, it's up in the air whether I'm going to have to masturbate when we reveal these hands, but to be honest, I'm not gonna stress about it~
There's no telling if I'll win or lose this hand, but to be honest, losing sounds pretty fun right about now.

I've been through worse and gotten out fine! I'm
a survivor.
Nude, out of options, staring down strangers with a handful of trash cards... I'm in my element.
Hrm. I don't believe in luck, but if my first hand is this poor, then mine must be pretty bad.
I'm not superstitious (other than ghosts and wizards and ghouls, those are obviously all real,) but if I was, I'd call this hand a bad omen.
You know, once I had to sort through the Pyro's hand collection to make sure the fingerprints were melted off. I think I preferred holding those to holding this one.

Chances are, I'm down
a layer. No big deal.
There's a layer gone, probably.
Well, I don't definitely have the worst hand, but I don't like these odds.
(Never tell me the odds!) Thank God I didn't say that part out loud...
Ever been surrounded by murderous robots in a bombed-out ghost town, alone, out of bullets, and with help nowhere in sight? Well, I have. That was a hell of a lot worse than this hand, is my point.

Could be better, could be worse. Couldn't be much worse, but it could
be worse.
This isn't looking great for me.
(Y'know, maybe I SHOULD have decided to bribe the dealer. Is it too late? Would it be awkward if I brought it up now?) Dealer, I- nevermind, nevermind.
Oh good, these nylons are starting to itch...
(Take a look at yourself, Pauling. Surrounded by strangers playing cards in your pantyhose and holding a 1 high. How did you get to this point in your life?)
Ugh, I hate being a servant to the whims of chance. I won't be anybody's servant! Except, uh... forget I said that.

Man, I sure am lucky that we're not betting our lives, or I'd be as good as toast. Well, I guess you're lucky we're not betting our lives, 'cause if we had been, I'd have been cheating from the start and you'd be
good as toast.
Well, winning isn't everything...
This RNG is kicking my ass. Nobody kicks my ass except MY COUCH after a long hard year of work! OK, I admit it, I don't own a couch...
Well, I could take off my glasses to stall the inevitable a bit longer, but then what would I do if I had to shoot something? Well miss, probably, but it was a rhetorical question.
I've got clothes, and I've got time. No need to stress about a bad hand if I've still got three more strikes.
(You've been through worse than this, Pauling. There's no assurance that you'll lose this hand just because it's subpar!)
(Work with me here, cards.)
This is not what I had in mind...
Son of a bitch... I should have traded the, uh... everything. Everything that I did was wrong.
Damnit, I was hoping it wouldn't be titty time just yet.
Alright! I guess it's titty time!
I'll admit it. I hate losing. I despise losing. But there's worse things to lose at, so I'll make the best of it!

I'll be straight with you guys- gay with you guys? My hand is terrible. Chances are, you're about to see my tits. But I'm not gonna let that get me down. This is a big night for me, so let's make it a hell of a night!
Tits out, staring down a hand of garbage... You've gotten through worse, Pauling.
Alright, who's staring? Be honest, I can tell.

We play a pretty simplified version of poker here at the Inventory, so the worst possible hand is 2, 3, 4, 5, 7. I'm really hoping one of you has one of those, so I have even the vaguest chance of not losing my panties.
So, this hand could be a little better. Or a lot better, even. But I'm gonna be alright. Worst case, this party gets a llittle hotter.
Ugh. Dealer, I'm glad I didn't bribe you, you do NOT deserve to get paid extra for these hands.
This might be it for me...
Ah, and the timing is just perfect... thanks, dealer, why don't you come and piss in my cornflakes while you're at it?
(Trash hand, no clothes, no sign of hope? Fuck that! I'm Pauling, I've dealt with worse than this shit every day of my life! Don't count me out just yet!)
This hand is unbeatable! You guys had better try for a straight or something, or you've got NO chance at beating me!
Wow... this might be game over for me...
Time to masturbate, coming up...
Time to masturbate, coming up! (That's right, Pauling, keep a positive mental attitude!)

I've had worse hands. Once, I had to retrieve a few bodies from a collapsed mineshaft. I saw a hand peeking through the rocks and tugged on it, and it was so rotten it came right off. Now that was a bad hand.

I've had my own fair share of adventures! The most recent one involved the lawfully-elected president of Bolivia, but I'm not supposed to talk
about that one.
(Ah, phew. If they'd stayed that way, I might have had to offer a free assassination out of obligation, and I really do not have the time for that right now.)
Ooh, what do we have here? A little naughty memento?
I can't tell you the specifics unless it actually happens, but I promise I can totally hide you if somebody does come by, Nagisa.
I can't give away all my secrets, but I promise if a boat comes by, I can make sure they absolutely won't even get a peek at you.

Aah, sweetheart... I know it must suck to know that something like that's happened... but sometimes, there's no idyllic middle ground. Sometimes, bad things have to happen. It doesn't make you a worse person, or any less of a hero. Chin up.
It's hard. But the fact that you still think about it is proof positive that you're a good person. You care, and you don't take human life lightly. That's what counts.
I know the world isn't as simple as a sequence of Trolley Problems, but stay strong. As long as you do what you believe is the right thing, you'll be alright.
If anything, the more concerning part is that I haven't seen a single person other than you folks since I came in here. Is that not a little weird to you guys?
Well if strip poker is the day-life, it must be wild. As for me, I won't have a chance to find out. I've probably gotta head out soon after the game.
I've got a robot or two! One of them sounds suspiciously like you, by the way. No clue what's up with that. I was under the impression Aperture didn't re-use voices for their Personality Cores.
Uuuh, a street urchin? Not that I'd have experience with that career path or anything.
I'd offer to buy drinks instead on account of me being well off, buuuuut... naah, I'll let her cover it.)
Ah, I'm jealous of anyone with enough free time to read books... I barely have enough time to read the month's Women's Hairstyles and Guns before bed.
(Sheesh, what a creep... if that girl comes any closer, I'm capping her, I don't care if it ruins the mood...)

That's a hard question. The further you get back, the more impactful things get, so it's hard to say. I guess the creation of the universe is probably #1, and after that... the formation of the Sun, definitely. See what I mean?

There's an old story I've heard that says that God created the universe in nine years, and that he's abandoned us because we're not interesting enough. I suppose it's not "outrageous," but it is outright strange.

Hah! I'm sure you're a monster on the track, Emi, but I'm a bit of a monster myself. No offense, but I'd honestly be a little sad if I beat you. You're
so energetic...
Real tempting offer, dark ruins where no one ever looks are some of my favourite places. Unfortunately, I have work tomorrow. And the next day... and the next 362 days after that. So, raincheck?

I don't have any specifics, but I can't help but wonder who was the first cavewoman to say, "fuck this, I'm not waiting another half hour for my man to get it up" and go snap off a mammoth tusk or something to do it herself.

That's a good question! Well did you know the course of events that ended in Tom Jones's death started with a war criminal, then continued with a wizard, an orphan and his robots, and an old folks' tour.

It's funny, RED Team and every member of the Teufort Nine is already pretty famous (or infamous, depending on you you ask,) but nobody really knows me. I guess it'd be nice to be known as the leader of the Nine.
There are some topics too serious to joke about without being an asshole. But if you don't mind that, there's nothing inherently morally wrong with joking about just about anything.
Yeah you'd better keep the knife and locket, considering 8 layers is the MAXIMUM. I'll accept a little rule-breaking in the name of fun, but going over the max number of layers is A-NOT-OK.
If you made me live without coffee or energy drinks I'd age 80 years in 48 hours and then spontaneously turn to dust. So yeah, you could say so.

Oiu oiu. You caught me in my favourite (and basically only, but let's not tell Miss Fashion that,) outfit. It
just screams "sporty,
clever, probably not a
psychopath," right?
You shouldn't be so confident, because I'm going to win. But as for your question, I'm partial to anything with a lot of sugar and caffeine. Energy drinks are a food, right?
Interesting plan, cutie. But don't count your panties before they come off. The winner here is me.

Well, the marketable answer is that I fight robots, bring down tyrannical governments, catch criminals, and search for a special priceless metal called Australium. You don't seem like the type who'd enjoy the un-marketable adventures.

Hah! That's a good question! Men can be inscrutable creatures, but they can also be pretty simple. Just give 'em a view of the goods and pretend you didn't mean to, and they'll be wrapped around your finger in no time.
Well, there's joke words like "Wonky," but if we're talking about stuff Mister Webster likes, "Minimum" is one... also, there's "Demoman," and "Engineer."
Normally I'd say "assassination," but as much as I hate to say it, Spy and Sniper have got me totally beat in that respect. So cleaning up crime scenes, maybe? Bribing public officials?

The Administrator has her sources. She found out about this place and sent me here to do recon of all you alternate-universe folks. (OK, that's all bullshit. Heavy just invited me to relax on my day off. But they don't need to know that.)
Hah! Well, in case I've forgotten to make it obvious before now, I'm definitely a handgun lady. Anything from a .22 to a wrist-snapping 50 cal, I'm a regular Annie Oakley.

First off, while I would be embarrassed to lose to a twerp like you, I doubt it'd even be a runner up for my most humiliating moment- where would getting your ass beat by a girl
sit on your list?

The power of not dying. Like if you get shot in the face, the power to not be dead after that happens. Not immortality neccessarily, it'd just be cool to not have to stress so much about not getting shot.
I had to beat a lying, cheating, conniving old snake to do it, but I actually won my favorite gun of all time in a game of poker. I don't have her on me now, but believe me, she's a masterpiece.
I've certainly never worked at Aperture, but my boss has had some communication with them over the years. I doubt we've actually met, though.
A great mercenary follows orders and doesn't act like a spoiled 9 year old with guns, but also knows how to get the job done and work independently if neccessary. You know, a professional.
Hm, I wouldn't say I play any sports, but I'm sure I could get into the 100m or competetive shooting and do pretty well for myself.
Wow, that's a much harder question than I realized at first... probably about three days that I remember, but I bet I spent longer than that when I was a baby.
(The intriguing part is that she clarified it couldn't be TOO violent. There are levels of violence that are fine...)
Hmph. Some ladies either have way too much time on their hands, or care way too much about what men think. Shaving is way too much of a hassle for busy ladies like you or me.
I know, it is a pretty, coup story, huh? Actually you know what if you could forget I made that pun I'd appreciate it. Can puns be classified?
But the guy was- oh, wait, I get it.
Some people do definitely take that pretty seriously. Scout's been waiting for that invitation in the mail for years. I don't have the heart to tell him I really doubt it's coming.

I have no idea what a "mobile fortress destroyer" is, but I've helped take out some REALLY big robots, a floating, haunted eye (thirteen times, that one!), an insane moron wizard, and the Horseless Headless Headsmann himself!

I haven't played this before, but if all goes well, I might come back here next year! I might even bring
some friends!
Well to be honest, I guess there are much worse things to get eaten by. Like, a horde of regular-sized frogs, right?

Smoking isn't the worst thing you can do. I know a couple of people who smoke their lungs out, and I'm pretty sure the Grim Reaper is more scared of them than they are of him. It's still kinda gross, though.

Family is only important on a, like... instinctual level. Functionally, once you're not a child anymore, your family isn't anything special. That doesn't mean family isn't a good thing, but it's not inherently any more important than just good friends.
Not to be callous, but a million dollars is chump change. I guess if it just got handed to me for free, it'd feel right to give it away to someone else in turn.

Depends on how stupid the mistake was. I'm not usually a very forgiving person- if they hurt me or someone I care about, I probably wouldn't just forget
about it.
I do. I won't clarify, no.
To be honest, I'm more concerned with little lies than with big ones. With a big, important lie, you can have a big, important excuse. With little ones... you're just lying, y'know?
Lights on, obviously. If I'm fucking somebody, why would I want us to not be able to see each other? What, did I accidentally jump into bed with Gargamel and now I don't wanna look?

I haven't really had any dedicated partners, but if I did, I definitely wouldn't care. Sex is for enjoying, so it's no big deal if they're doing a little extra-curricular enjoying. The only issue is if they hide it and lie about it.

Oh yeah, most of you folks live in the future where you can watch whatever porn you want, right? Where I come from, I've gotta make do with the shit they'll show on broadcast TV. In other words, usually total garbage.

I don't know much about your Confederacy Corps, but it would have had to have been an absolute nightmare to compete with RED Team. Have you ever had to be surrounded by nine testosterone-fueled high-functioning psychopaths for 10 years?

I've got way too many war stories to tell here. We've fought armies, insurgents, criminals, vigilantees, robots, ghosts, mutants, spectres, devils, and our own inner demons. That last one was a joke, but the rest was all dead serious.
Good work, Nagisa! We're all proud of you!
That was exquisite work, Nagisa. Well done.
Well played, Nagisa. Thank you for the wonderful show.

Oh, if you think that's shocking let me tell you about the time that my coworkers- oh wait no that's definitely classified. Uh, The Demoman once- nope, that's also a no go. Uh, honestly everything I do professionally is very boring and normal. Yep.
"How far along is technology?" That's a pretty hard question to answer without context. We have guns and telivisions and airplanes and teleporters- you know, the normal stuff.
Magic exists, but in my experience, people who use magic tend to be kinda pathetic...
I don't have any pets myself, but I usually end up responsible for a bunch of grown men that may as well be lost pets.

That's a hard question, to be honest! I like playing cards, and I admit I like stripping too, but to be frank I think I mostly just came here on a whim 'cause it sounded fun! It's certainly been fun so far.
Sheesh, you hit that nail right on the head. Yes, it is a competitive field for sure.
Not a reason I'm... at liberty to talk about. But to be clear, you can call me whatever you like, as long as it's not... offensive, or something.
What an... appropriate question. I half suspect you know more than you let on. But suffice it to say I do put a lot of thought into color-coordination.
It's funny, I do have a bit of experience in the legal field. But unfortunately, I can't accept your offer. Previous engagements, and all.
You know it, Miss Fey.
Nevermind. Just looking at you, I think you probably have. But RED is almost definitely worse, trust me.
That's not quite the type of question you ask on the first date, Ayano. I mean come on, at least beat me in strip poker first.

Haha! Don't worry about it, Nagisa! I didn't come to play strip poker just to stay fully clothed the whole time! It's all in the
spirit of fun.
I am used to supervising children.
I am an Administrative Professional!
I'm not concerned about anyone finding out about this. The confidentiality agreements we signed are pretty ironclad. The only way it's getting out is if there's a Spy in this room...
Thanks for asking! I'm a secretary, cleaner, disposal agent, and the personal handler of a group of my employer's employees. It's challenging work, but the pay is great.
I'm associated with several companies operating out of Teufort, New Mexico. You can look up Mann Co., Reliable Excavation and Demolition, and Builder's League United.
Well sheesh, when you put it that way. But you're of age, right? I mean, I assume they wouldn't have let you in otherwise.
Pfff, my career would be ruined because what I'm doing in this pocket reality isn't legal enough? If you want a "favor" from me, you can contact my employer.
"Oh no, the illustrious Miss Pauling engaged in a game of STRIP POKER? Her image shall be ruined!" If you want a favor, just ask. Worst I can say is "no" or "pay me."
Thank you for asking, but I... well, suffice it to say you can just call me Pauling. Or anything else you want, frankly. As long as it's clear you're talking to me, I don't mind.
It's not something I'm at liberty to discuss. But suffice it to say, it's not so much what I do as it is who I do it for.
Hold the phone, when did this become a game show? I'm not the most suitable for public relations.
Uh, thanks i guess? I just came to have some fun, maybe throw someshade while I'm at it.
I appreciate you keeping the energy high, Mettaton. Just don't go too crazy with it.
